tool_description: Welcome to the Steam Market API, your gateway to a treasure trove of information about the vibrant world of gaming on Steam! 😄🎮 Our API provides a seamless experience for developers and gamers alike, offering a range of powerful endpoints to retrieve all the juicy details about the Steam market and store.  Need up-to-date pricing information for a specific game or item? Look no further! 📈💰 Our endpoints deliver real-time market data, including current prices, historical trends, and volume sta...
name: Steam Market and Store
title: Steam Market and Store

api_list.name: Retrieve Buy/Sell informations by ID
api_list.description: From a given ID, retrieve the latest Buy/Sell orders placed on the Steam Store.

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description: Retrieve this ID from the Get Items IDs by query endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com/get_orders_hist/730---Dreams %26 Nightmares Case"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com/get_orders_hist/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get latest activity by ID
api_list.description: Given a specific ID, retrieve the last activity dealed with it. Basic information about the user performing the activity is also provided.

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description: Retrieve this ID from the Get Items IDs by query endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com/get_last_act/730---Dreams %26 Nightmares Case"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Price History By ID
api_list.description: For a given ID, get the price history together with the number of items sold.

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description: Retrieve this ID from the Get Items IDs by query endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com/get_price_history/730---Dreams %26 Nightmares Case"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Items IDs by query
api_list.description: Enter a (text) query and retrieve the IDS associated to your items. This ID will be needed in order to explore market information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com/get_ids/case"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com/get_ids/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-market-and-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
